lender.name: Miriam

lender.name: Karin and Giles
lender.loan_because: We can. With much regret, because Kiva insists on continuing to support loans for blood sport enterprises, we are withdrawing our funds as quickly as they are repaid. We are redirecting all of our loans to www.energyincommon.org, which doesn't mock our ethical principles.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: I want to help a little.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I view the money I will lend the same way as any object or thing I own which I'm not using right now. If I don't need it right now - why shouldn't someone else who has a need for it, get use out of it. I'm not using it right now anyway, it's just sitting here doing nothing. It's a no-brainer.

lender.name: William

lender.occupational_info: I pastor a church - I preach and teach God's word and I try to love others in the way Jesus would.

lender.name: B. Brothers Maisha Soul
lender.loan_because: i want to progress...
lender.occupational_info:
The group is known by the name of MAISHA SOUL which means simply âSOUL of LIFEâ.
In 2003, after a great events happening in GOMA, the volcano eruption, a great number of population became homeless and spending their night under the stars and suddenly the country was occupied by the different rebellions that could not guaranteed the security. Life condition of a man Congolese people not having been favourable to the Congo (our country). An idea came to a Christian family living in the same misfortune as well as passionate in music and this is composed with two parents with five brothers and one sister fond of music, four brother very much passionate and coming from different choir in Catholic church in GOMA under this initiative one of these four who is the eldest of the family called Prince Agakan , and able to create in July 2nd 2003 a musical group called dji:life which means in English âgroup of lifeâ that actually changed its name into MAISHA SOUL. This having been in the place, the three brothers measures themselves to give one another a hand by the initiative of their older brother.
Inspired by the traditional songs and modern, MAISHA SOUL measures itself to bring a contribution with a combination well resolved by many styles such as R&B, soul, slow, Raga, HIP HOP traditional and modern; for giving another sound that reveals its own accent and decided itself to do a music commitment and research. Hence, MAISHA SOUL suggest, regarding the social situation that progress in risk as well as in peril in Africa in General and in the DRC in particular, to give its value added through this peaceful message and peaceful cohabitation in order eventually may reign brotherhood, equality, and freedom .

This money, I am passing along to help others. Seemed like a very good thing to do with it. I chose to donate to a person working in agriculture as I worked and grew up on a farm.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I am so very lucky. I am healthy. I am surrounded by family and friends. And, I am self-employed doing something which I LOVE -- so it doesn't even feel like work. What little I loan out is my small way of spreading the love.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of dogs, cats, most any pet a person can have -- except I'm squeamish about snakes. I'm truly blessed to be able to support myself taking care of some of God's wonderful creatures.

lender.name: Brendan
lender.loan_because: In memory of my son who was killed in a senseless act of violence. This is a tribute to the man that Brendan R. Talley was becoming and the things that he valued. He had a huge heart. Brendan Robert Talley October 30th, 1990 to August 10th, 2009
lender.occupational_info: In remembrance.

lender.name: Christopher & Sara
lender.loan_because: God has blessed us with more than enough, and this is one of many ways to give and help those who need it. We love the concept of this program, and hope that everyone who is a part of it is blessed with success in their business.

lender.name: Elias
lender.loan_because: I believe in people standing on their own feet

lender.name: David

lender.name: Ian

lender.name: Nancy

lender.occupational_info: Work at my school consists of supporting staff and students by assisting them with a multitude of tasks, mostly financial and budget related. I often feel like another mother to them all. It is a good thing.

lender.name: Ramondo
lender.loan_because: God is good. He has given, and teaches us to give as well =)

lender.name: Team LOTUS
lender.whereabouts: LOTUS: Lend Out To Uplift Self-sufficiency at Kiva.org
lender.loan_because: it can be the answer someone is hoping for, in order to continue/grow their business and get ahead in life. Kiva provides us the platform to support them. We started the LOTUS team to do our little bit on Kiva. It is a wonderful experience connecting with people world-wide on Kiva.org.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: So many people have helped me financially over the years now its time for me to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I create, market and sell digital products (e-books) online.

lender.name: Andreas
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can (many many bad things are done "because I can", so let's do some good things "because I can"...)

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: The Banks wont - at least not to those who really need

lender.name: Unu
lender.loan_because: my husband in from a 3rd world country
lender.occupational_info: I work together with a great group persons to develop new, safe medicines

lender.name: Joerg's family
lender.loan_because: of our two children

lender.name: santosh surykant
lender.loan_because: for doing bussiness in manufactring of cashew nut
lender.occupational_info: agriculture processing,value addtion,

lender.name: Harald
lender.loan_because: I want to support other people to become independent.
lender.occupational_info: I'm helping people to adopt open source/free software solutions for an open and free IT infrastructure.

lender.name: veronica
lender.loan_because: i want to have more fabrics or materials to support my tailoring,i need stock of sportswear fabric and accessories,i need also to buy special machines for sewing,.i need a capital of $5,000
lender.occupational_info: i have a small tailoring in tacloban city,leyte,we make sports uniforms .,p.e. uniforms.

lender.name: Taryn
lender.loan_because: It warms my heart to help others be successful through microloans. I help because when I needed help, just even a little bit, I was unable to get any... So, as Gandhi put it - "You must be the change you want to see in the world. "
lender.occupational_info: I teach small business owners, especially women, how to grow their businesses when they have more time than money. :) I founded a business women's networking organization in 2007 and I teach workshops on social media marketing, networking and non-conventional marketing tactics.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I'm grateful for all the opportunities I've had, mostly due to the relatively-fortunate circumstances of my birth, and I'd like to share a bit of that with others.
lender.occupational_info: I referee football and basketball games and umpire baseball and softball games, usually in high school and youth sports leagues.

lender.name: Aidan
lender.loan_because: I am.

lender.name: Kathryn
lender.loan_because: I want to recognize every person's human dignity.
lender.occupational_info: I teach and every semester my students each loan a dollar, so that we can make multiple $25 loans.

lender.name: Karen and Sara
lender.loan_because: Karen & Sara have much, we want to share with others.
lender.occupational_info: Karen works hard teaching and Sara works hard learning.

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people.
lender.occupational_info: I design and build databases.

lender.name: Christopher and Kristie
lender.loan_because: "From everyone who has been given much, much will be demanded; and from the one who has been entrusted with much, much more will be asked." Luke 12:48

lender.name: Triona
lender.loan_because: I'm selfish. Microlending restores some balance to an otherwise unfair global economy. It empowers individuals, both lenders and borrowers, to make a difference. The happier the global family, the kinder we will be to each other, our co-inhabitants and planet Earth herself. This makes me happy.

lender.name: Cornerstone Church
lender.loan_because: faith.hope.love.

lender.name: Margo
lender.loan_because: I prescribe to the growing belief that focusing on women and girls is the most effective way to fight global poverty and extremism.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do and I enjoy helping people.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the field of technology for a global media company.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are trying to better their situation and because as a Christian I am touched by people's needs.
lender.occupational_info: I teach Bible and family relations in a Christian university.

lender.name: Jeff & Carla
lender.loan_because: What will you tell God on your day of judgement when he asks why we didn't when he gave us so much?
lender.occupational_info: I help people with their greiving process and she helps take care of the sick people.

lender.name: GonÃ§alo
lender.loan_because: I see it as a powerful tool to act against poverty

lender.name: Roberto
lender.loan_because: I needed to do something different and I had been struggling for a while, then I decided to help people get ahead and have pride and dignity.
lender.occupational_info: I worked in the field of Foreign Trade and lived in several countries

lender.name: T.J. Cornwall
lender.loan_because: I loan because these entrepreneurs need the money and support more than I need it. I can reach a vast amount of people and can really make a difference in this world.
lender.occupational_info: I write and perform original music.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in peoples lives as my response to Christ's work in mine.
lender.occupational_info: I pastor a United Methodist Congregation.

lender.name: Ashlee
lender.occupational_info: I do research in the field of education. I also teach college students about the role of education in society.

lender.name: Twila
lender.loan_because: Being a single mom with 5 children, I've been through very difficult times. Every little bit of help was a blessing.
lender.occupational_info: I enjoy driving a city bus because so many people ride and give me a big smile when they see me. It's a good job and I work 40-55 hours a week

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Nancie
lender.loan_because: this is one way that I can help
lender.occupational_info: Environmental

lender.loan_because: This is absolutely free and it is only for you! Play now!
lender.occupational_info: free casinos, online games, casino

lender.name: Danielle
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help people take action to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I recently finished an undergraduate degree in zoology at the University of Guelph and now I am working as a biological control research assistant at CABI Europe in Switzerland.
